theRhythmGirl:MeasurePower.NAME: Measure
DESCRIPTIONS: #yMeasures are obtained by gaining enough #yBeats. They have no effect by themselves.

theRhythmGirl:DoubleUpPower.NAME: Double Up
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn gains #yRepeat.
cards you play each turn have #yRepeat.

theRhythmGirl:PartyCrackerPower.NAME: Party Cracker
DESCRIPTIONS: damage. At the end of your turn, double the damage of this effect.

theRhythmGirl:RhythmHeavenPower.NAME: Rhythm Heaven
DESCRIPTIONS: #yOn #yBeat effects always trigger regardless of your current #yBeat.

theRhythmGirl:KarateTimingPower.NAME: Karate Timing
DESCRIPTIONS: You can only play attacks if you have exactly #b1 #yBeat. This power doesn't stack beyond #b1.
